summary: Retexture of Ivory Armor from DLC Dawnguard
descriptionHtml:
============
DESCRIPTION
============
Retexture of Ivory Armor from DLC Dawnguard 
For males and females 
Recommended use with Snow Elf race mods
Write in comments if you like)

===========
REQUIRED
===========
DLC Dawnguard

===========
INSTALL
===========
Copy to Data folder

============
UNINSTALL
============
Delete textures/dlc01/armor/ivoryarmor
author: Den987
